titleStmt.title: Newes from the New Exchange, or The commonvvealth of ladies, drawn to the life, in their severall characters and concernments.
titleStmt.author: Neville, Henry, 1620-1694.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the year, of women without grace, 1650.

notesStmt.note: Variants: (1) mispaginated [2], 2 [i.e. 21], [1] p. (p. 21 misnumbered 2); (2) paginated [2], 21, [1]p. (i.e. p. 22 not numbered).
Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 30th 1649", the 50 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
